'''Heden''', "the leather and fur clad", was the father of [[Eoh]] and [[Beorn (son of Heden)|Beorn]], and a grandfather of [[Eriol]], according to the early version of the [[legendarium]] in ''[[The Book of Lost Tales]]''.

He was said to be a descendant of the god [[wikipedia:Odin|Wóden]].<ref name="Hed"/>
